author: stsp
msg: Follow-up to r40321:
r40321 caused svn to use a wrong copyfrom path in case a directory was
copied, and then one of its children was copied. The false copyfrom points
to the source of the root of the first copy operation, rather than the
source of the copied child. If you did such a copy using a trunk client as
of r40321 or later (up to this commit), you'll need to fix copyfrom info
somehow (e.g. via dump/edit/load or by copying again from history).
* subversion/libsvn_wc/copy.c
(determine_copyfrom_info): Restore pre-r40321 behaviour to calculate
correct copyfrom info for copies of children of locally copied
subdirectories. Also adjust variable names to match corresponding
output parameter names of svn_wc__db_read_info(), for clarity.
Found by: gstein

author: julianfoad
msg: Improve the error condition encountered when trying to use a DAV
write-through proxy but not having mod_proxy loaded. See this email thread:
<http://subversion.tigris.org/ds/viewMessage.do?dsForumId=462&dsMessageId=2412741>.
In mod_dav_svn, when processing an SVNMasterURI directive, check that
mod_proxy is available in the httpd runtime.  Forwarding writes to a master
from a slave requires the mod_proxy handler, and when it isn't present, the
failure is ugly & opaque.  Apache's core, default handler sends back a "405
Not Allowed," for non-GET which looks like an authz failure.
BTW, there's precedent for using ap_find_linked_module() to check that
module dependencies are present.  Namely, mod_rewrite looks for mod_proxy,
and mod_authnz_ldap looks for util_ldap.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/mod_dav_svn.c
(SVNMasterURI_cmd): Use ap_find_linked_module() to ensure that mod_proxy
is available.
Patch by: Dave Brown <dave.brown{_AT_}wandisco.com>

author: philip
msg: * notes/wc-ng-design: fix a typo

author: stsp
msg: On the 1.5.x-r40200 branch, resolve a semantic conflict I didn't find
in the first pass (should've run tests...)
* subversion/tests/cmdline/autoprop_tests.py
(autoprop_tests): check_proplist() takes a different parameter list
in 1.5.x than in 1.6.x and trunk.
